products.title: Rimini, Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

products.title: Rimini, Chocolate - Roller Blind
products.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

products.title: Spectrum, Lisbon Brown - Venetian Blind
products.description: The lisbon brown from the spectrum range is a deep chocolate shade that just oozes chic sophistication. Its smooth satin finish means that light bounces off it without being too bright or overpowering, and the slats are easily adjustable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Make use of the lisbon brown as part of a gold and neutral themed living room or bedroom, by grouping with soft whites, creamy beiges, and subtle golds, to complete a luxurious and timeless dcor scheme that you'll always feel at home in.

products.title: Spectrum, Tawny Port - Venetian Blind
products.description: The deep red of the spectrum in tawny port can't help but take centre stage, with its smooth satin finish and classic hue. Let the light in, or keep it out, by using the pull-cords to gently adjust the heavy-duty aluminium slats as you please. Set the tawny port against rich cream walls for a cosy living room or den, and set the shade apart with soft silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Alternatively, give your hallway or landing a warm, welcoming feel by adding this deep, rich shade.

products.title: Deanna, Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna latte combines the signature patterning of the deanna with a rich, creamy brown we call latte. The pretty texture adds interest, while the colour is subtle and fairly neutral, and combined they offer a quality finish perfect for your home. Ideal for bringing a touch of much needed warmth to all-white conservatory or utility, this blind will look stunning combined with natural furniture and woods.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: Indulge your guests in comforting colour with the roma (fr) in latte, featuring a rich and delectable shade of brown. This lenient fabric is both crease-proof and flame-retardant, making it an elegant and modern blind with added practical benefits. Feature the latte amidst an assortment of neutral tones including cream, biscuit, and caramel hues to generate a dcor style with sumptuous and sophisticated colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Hazel - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too. Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges.

products.title: Wood Effect, Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wood effect walnut is a traditional wood-look brown, formed into slim, tilting slats that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. The heavy gauge aluminium slats provide quality and durability, so you can rest easy knowing that this blind will stand the test of time. Pair the walnut with matching woods, soft creams, and chocolate browns for a luxurious yet functional feel in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many households, so feature the popular origin (blackout) in coffee in your bedroom for some well-deserved rest. This simple addition will help to shield the room against the night-time light, whilst fitting in most window spaces perfectly, and adding some brilliance to your dcor. Merge the coffee with a rich and captivating combination of cream, caramel, and cocoa hues, creating a comforting space full of warming tones.

products.title: Origin, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: This time in warm oak, the origin range delivers high quality basswood slats sourced from ecologically responsible forests. The blind comes with a matching pelmet, bottom rail, and acorns for a slick and streamlined aesthetic. Add some natural style to even the most contemporary of settings by including the warm oak in an all-white bedroom, using the blind and wooden furniture to provide the only colour in the room.

products.title: Origin, Dark Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: In dark, grey-toned brown, the origin in dark brown is a deep yet neutral blind that will match a range of dcor schemes, colour palettes, and woods. With movable strips for light and privacy, hidden controls and brackets, and a sleek and impactful design, this blind is the height of luxury. Use the dark brown as part of a neutral colour scheme, surrounding it with white, cream, or ivory walls and furniture and accessories in cocoas, mochas, and taupes.

products.title: Origin, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: The origin brown consists of a milky coffee-toned fabric, smooth with just the faintest of textures, and similarly shaded threading through a translucent netting. Brackets and controls are hidden neatly away in the overhead rail cassette, yet are easily accessible as needed. Team the brown with a rich burnt orange for a cosy, autumnal colour scheme in a dining room or living room. Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

products.title: Origin, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: Classically elegant, the origin in old walnut displays a dark-toned finish on the responsibly sourced basswood typical of this range. A heavy duty headrail is specially designed to hold the weight of the wood and all components are formed from high quality materials. Mix the traditional with the contemporary by including the old walnut in a modernly styled dining room, blending with pale sage walls and white trim.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a window covering with delectable shading and contemporary style, elect the modest roma (fr) in latte, which hosts a creamy, coffee shade on an ample, crease-free cloth. With modern effect and graceful elegance, this classy fabric sits in adaptable slats that allow you to manually regulate the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Fashion a sophisticated living space by coordinating the latte with a flattering cream surrounding, adding accenting colour with plenty of coffee-toned fabrics and conker-hued furnishings.

products.title: Kolsva, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an elegant window covering with value, choose the kolsva tawny oak with its high quality standard and sustainably sourced timber. The authentic louvres and modern components allow you to create a sophisticated style, with the added practicality of ventilation and shading flexibilities. Fashion a vibrant and inspired tribal theme in your lounge by hanging the tawny oak against a burnt orange backing, with opposing cream.

products.title: Kolsva, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kolsva pale oak brings a touch of the natural world inside your home in a truly timeless way. With the gentle ebb and flow of the grain set against a warm and cosy shade you'll be able to sit back and relax as you appreciate the finer things in life. Turning the guest bedroom into the home away from home that your guests will never want to leave is all about adding those homely touches that put them at ease.

products.title: Deanna, Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: Soft and neutral, with a curved twist pattern to add depth and interest, the deanna in latte will add subtle class to any home. This warm filter blind is a pretty taupe fabric with a high quality finish, and its easy-to-use tilting mechanism makes it long-lasting and durable. A neutral colour scheme in the home office can feel relaxing and tranquil, a feeling many of us need in order to be able to work effectively.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in coffee is indeed a deep coffee shade of brown, and forms an effective blackout blind with its durable, opaque fabric. Neat louvres hang from the rail and can be tilted and moved as you please - or indeed as the sun dictates. Group the coffee with hues of the same ilk, such as pale cappuccinos and soft mochas, to create the perfect colour scheme for the kitchen, where you'll be drinking your morning tea.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats. Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of naturally toned timber with matching pelmets and rails creates a compelling feature that allows flexibility to suit your shading and privacy preferences. As the tawny oak features a quality, anti-cracking and warping component, fashion a distinctive dcor scheme in your kitchen, with similarly shaded surfaces.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjoy a calming natural colour that accentuates the free-flowing beauty of wood grain. There's nothing better than a lounge that allows you to switch off and put your feet up is there? With pale oak hanging with pride in your window you'll be able to create a theme with nothing more than a lightly coloured rug and matching ceramic table lamp.

products.title: Origin, Chocolate Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: This time in milky chocolate brown, the origin range provides stylish functionality, with its streamlined rail cassette, hidden controls, and sleek, sliding strips. The fabric itself is neatly woven, offering just the gentlest of texturing. Mix the chocolate brown with sage green tones for an outdoors-in look and feel in your home office. Treat yourself to a heavy oak desk and include warming fabrics in these two contrasting shades.

products.title: Magnum, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: A golden-hued woody shade, and with sliding translucent strips between the double-layered fabric, the magnum in brown is both attractive and functional. The overhead rail cassette hides the controls from view, making for a clean and streamlined effect. Add the brown to a forest green colour scheme, allowing the wood-look hue to complement the outdoorsy green. Include plenty of natural woods in the room and accent throughout with organic, forest and sage greens, deep browns, and understated golds for a coordinated and coherent look.

products.title: Faux Suede, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Imagine your ideal coffee-coloured blind with a fabric just as soft and creamy, and you have the gorgeous faux suede in latte. The gentle fawn colour complements the softness of the suede-feel cloth to create a luxurious and touchable look. The latte will work well in a living room or den to provide a taming neutral to deep chocolate browns and dark forest greens. Furnish the room with plenty of natural woods, both dark and medium, and accent throughout with muted brushed golds.

products.title: Devonshire, Light Brown - Roman Blind
products.description: Introduce a sophisticated and stylish look to your home with the devonshire in light brown, where biscuit and taupe threads fuse to form a distinct look with a washed denim effect, creating a casual blind with subtle texture and harmonising hues. Blend the light brown with opulent linens and fresh bursts of ivory to create a clean and contemporary palette, enriching the blind with complementary fabrics in warm caramel and mocha tones for and elegant feel, and adding bursts of gold for a touch of luxe.

products.title: Delphinium, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: Form an artistic and individual space by including the attractive watercoloured print of the delphinium caramel blind. An array of dove grey, caramel, and oatmeal forms an artsy floral print on a relaxed and nimble cloth, showcasing creative personality with little effort. Combine the caramel with a soothing biscuit base for a relaxed and welcoming feel, adding soft furnishings and layered fabrics in gracious shades of slate grey, oatmeal, and honey.

products.title: Maurice, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and chocolatey, the maurice in chocolate is the height of luxe. This roman blind keeps it simple though, letting its gorgeously textured fabric and rich coffee hue speak for themselves, without pattern or fuss. The neutrality of the chocolate makes it an adaptable buddy for accompanying a wide range of design and colour schemes, so feel free to take your pick when it comes to backdrops and accents.

products.title: Faux Suede, Dark Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Form a luxurious and inviting feel in any surrounding with the faux suede in delicious dark chocolate, where a blend of fine threads form a sultry suede effect for a modern blind full of tempting texture and contemporary style. Create a welcoming and cosy living room by complementing the dark chocolate with alike velvety materials and sumptuous linens, incorporating the deep brown hue with similar cocoa tones and caramel hints for a delectable and everlasting palette of dessert-inspired shades.

products.title: Magnum, Light Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: Chocolate brown threads gently interject a golden canvas in the magnum in light brown, where the translucent strips add texture and style as well as versatile practicality. This blind is ideal for maintaining your privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light into the room. Make the most of the varying shades of the light brown by opting for a brown and gold colour scheme in the living room. Blend with luxurious chocolate fabrics and brushed gold features for the ultimate in style and elegance.

products.title: Sicily, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: In subtle mocha and golden taupe, the sicily chocolate is simply delectable. Pretty diamonds emboss the plain fabric, and further adornments come in the form of fluffy tufts of coffee on top, adding texture and depth to this discreetly glamorous blind. Fashion a classic brown, gold, and cream scheme in the spare bedroom so that your guests can relax in comfort and style, making themselves at home.

products.title: Maurice, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: Impress your guests with the elegant and alluring maurice in caramel, showcasing a sophisticated neutral shade of honeyed beige and presented on a plush, velvety cloth made from silky thread for enriching texture and a tempting golden sheen. Merge the glossy caramel with beguiling shades of buttery cream, taupe, and mocha for a heavenly and inviting palette. Incorporate soft furnishings and plush throws with dreamy, downy textures, adding eye-catching gilded ornaments and golden accessories for a luxuriant finish with traditional style.

products.title: Shine, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a golden bronze, the shine in brown offers a gentle, appealing shimmer that catches the light beautifully. To allow flexible light and privacy, a sheer strip can be moved up and down between the pretty gold fabric, making for practicality as well as style. Use the brown to offset deep chocolate and coffee shades to create a feeling of luxury and opulence in your living room. Choose a gentle mocha tone for two of the walls, leaving those remaining in cream, and furnish with rich brown woods and golden accents.

products.title: Grove, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: A pretty country roman blind, the grove in auburn features artistic florals in autumnal tones of red, rust, lilac, and green, among others, and the look is strikingly understated. The cotton fabric means it's soft and supple yet strong and sturdy, so will sit beautifully in neat roman folds. The auburn surely belongs in the kitchen, set amidst other country hues. Think cream walls and sage green kitchen units and cupboards, with rusty oranges and rural mauves accenting across the board.

products.title: Windsor, Latte - Roman Blind
products.description: Gorgeous in soft, vintage gold, the windsor latte is reminiscent of creamy coffee or warm, sticky caramel, making it a delectable and attractive blind. Texture is added to the silky soft fabric using slightly raised ribbing scattered occasionally across its surface. Set the latte against a bold cornflower blue, using it as both a tempering neutral and an highlighting accent to make the blue truly pop.

products.title: Paradise, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes. Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully.

products.title: Feather, Coffee - Roman Blind
products.description: As easy on the eye as a feather is soft to the touch, the feather in coffee blends a classic image with contemporary styling and warming colour. A latte shade takes centre stage, with feathers drawn in soft cream, giving a pretty, lightweight look and feel to the blind. Add the warmth of the coffee to a similarly toned bedroom, surrounding with shades of cream and latte throughout the room. Go for rich, plush fabrics for a feeling of homeliness and luxury, giving the room plenty of texture and depth.

products.title: Woodland, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat folds that make the roman blind so special. Go for an autumn-themed living room by surrounding the auburn with similar green and brown colours in natural tones. Choose natural woods, jute rugs, and plenty of wools, accenting throughout with the occasional deep forest green and chocolate brown to add depth and interest.

products.title: Nova, Walnut - Roman Blind
products.description: The smooth, moccasin-feel nova walnut offers an appetising chocolate brown, giving it a cosy and warm look and feel. Detailing is added using tiny zigzag patterning in contrasting brown shades, providing this blind with depth and texture. Use the walnut as part of a snug living room or den, accompanied by country cream walls and medium woods. For an accent colour, opt for a soft aqua or duck egg for a modern and calming feel, or shimmering gold for a touch of glamour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Kent, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curving roman arches. Team the chocolate with softer lattes, oatmeals, and creams for a cosy and warm ambience in the living room. Opt for polished woods, whether light, medium, or dark, and use shimmering or brushed golds to add an understated sense of glamour to the room.

products.title: Kent, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: In a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and will match a wide range of stronger, bolder hues. Couple the caramel with a jet black for a contemporary yet opulent finish in a new-build's living room. You, and your guests, will love this sumptuous colour combination, which is easily accented with gold and black soft furnishings and accessories.

products.title: Roller, 4060 Dark Brown - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1264 Shiny Cappuccino - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1264 shiny cappuccino - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1260 Misty Brown - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1260 misty brown - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1261 Lovely Latte - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1261 lovely latte - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6518 Structured Chocolate  - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6518 structured chocolate - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6517 Structured Cappuccino  - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6517 structured cappuccino - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Bayham, Coffee - Vista Blind
products.description: The bayham range is all about allowing you that bespoke touch that adds comfort and functionality to any home. By combining the gently flowing voile panels with a homely deep brown we call coffee we have created something a little special that will allow you to add modern style and effortless functionality to your home. Coffee is a natural colour that acts as the perfect canvas to bring other finishes and tones into your room.

products.title: Daytona, Cosmic Latte - Plantation Shutter
products.description: In a neutral oatmeal shade of grey, the daytona cosmic latte is soothing and natural. It's the perfect solution for those looking for a neutral colour that matches most colour schemes without opting for white. Choose from three unique styles. The cosmic latte will look lovely amidst many different dcor schemes, and will fit in particularly well with a neutral scheme, surrounded by chocolates, coffees, and creams.
